subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Books and Literature
lead_paragraph: In the book, Floyd Landis, last year’s Tour de France winner, appears to contradict some of the testimony he gave at an arbitration hearing on charges of doping last month.
snippet: In the book, Floyd Landis, last year’s Tour de France winner, appears to contradict some of the testimony he gave at an arbitration hearing on charges of doping last month.
